Articles.Content:
For the past few days i've been trying to get a dock/rendezvous, So i looked for a easier way and i used Mechjeb.![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

All the tutorials are either a year or two old... The Mechjeb Wikipedia really doesn't explain HOW to use it... I just want to rendezvous for God sake. Can someone please help me?![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

For Rendezvous:

============

Target the other ship

Open MechJeb

Click "Rendezvous AutoPilot"

Click the button

If you're playing in career mode and don't have that function yet:

Open MechJeb

Click "Maneuver Planner"

Click "Align Planes with Target", then "Create and Execute"

Click "Hohmann transfer", then "Create and Execute"

Click "Find tune intercept", then "Create and Execute"

Click "Match velocities with target", then "at closest approach", then "Create and Execute"

Or just search for "MechJeb Rendezvous" on Youtube, and you'll get videos like this: [http://youtu.be/c8XSE62DOvo](https://youtu.be/c8XSE62DOvo)

For Docking (once you're within 200m):

=============================

Open MechJeb

Click "Docking AutoPilot"

Click the button
(and put the AR202 part on your ship)

If your playing career mode you will unlock the first mechjeb module, allowing only SMARTASS, you will need to go further down the tech tree to unlock other functions for mechjeb. 

Otherwise, in sandbox mode - as above. 

Mechjeb should have a little tab on the right side of the screen when on the launch pad wherever. Click to open that tab and get your menu where you find manuver planner window. 

Have you installed it correctly, have you added the mechjeb module to your vessel? where are you lost?
Thank you so much! Ive been trying to figure it out for weeks!![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
